title:
Con-rod Bearing Play, Check (Plastigage Method),
(Z 20 LET)

steps.text: Mark installation position (1) of con-rod bearing cap - remove con-rod bearing cap from con-rod.
To prevent the strip from tearing when removing the con-rod bearing cap, remove grease from the con-rod journal and lightly oil con-rod bearing shell. Do not turn the crankshaft.
Route Plastigage (malleable plastic strip) over the entire width of the con-rod bearing journal.
Attach con-rod bearing cap to con-rod - tightening torque 35 Nm + 45째 + 15 . To check the con-rod bearing play, the bolts can be used once again.
Remove con-rod bearing cap again. Compare width of flattened plastic thread (arrow) with measuring scale.
Permissible con-rod bearing play: 0.006 to 0.031 mm.
Note: When reading the value, do not confuse millimetres and inches on the measuring scale.
Clean con-rod bearing journal and con-rod bearing shell and lubricate lightly.
Attach con-rod bearing cap to con-rod with new bolts - note installation position of con-rod bearing cap - tightening torque 35 Nm + 45째 + 15째 .
